name: Tag Team Survivors
description:
Created in 7 days for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2 on the theme "You're Not Alone".

In this Vampire Survivors-like, you'll choose two characters joined by a damaging tether. Trap enemies between you and your partner to damage them with the tether. Collect EXP with both characters to increase the team Morale. At higher Morale your exp gain is multiplied and the strength of the tether grows.

Power ups and weapons are shared between characters but each has unique starting stats. Find your favourite pairing!

Keyboard and gamepad are supported with only the joystick and the space/A/X button required to play.
